GenNormals.description: Post-processing can automatically calculate the mesh normals. If normals already exist, setting GenNormals to true will do nothing

CalcTangents.description: Post-processing can automatically calculate the mesh tangents. If tangents already exist, setting CalcTangents to true will do nothing

VertexBufferUsage.description: The usage type for the VertexBuffer

IndexBufferUsage.description: The usage type for the IndexBuffer

MaterialDefinitions.description: The list of all the material definitions for each subset of the model

MaterialName.description: The name of the subset. This is usually extracted from the source model file

HMATFilePath.description: The file path to the *.hmat file for the material

TextureDefinitions.description: The textures used in the shader. ORDER MATTERS!! They will be fed to the shader in the order that they are specified here

FilePath.description: The file path to the texture

Sampler.description: The sampler to use with the texture
